name: Really funny...
reviewBody:
Folks, this is one of the funniest stand-up comedy I've ever seen. You'll immediately laugh from the second Jamel Debbouze gets on stage. And believe me when I say you'll laugh until the end.

The jokes aren't far fetched and always at point. You would think that Jamel Debbouze would loose his funny vibe, after becoming well know on the big screen BUT what was I wrong. He really knows what he's talking about and didn't make any mistake.

I've watched this show every day since the first day I laid my eyes on it and I'm sure you will all love it too. I so hope he'll ever do another one

My score: DEFENATLY 10/10!
